thread.title: ‘Harry Potter’ Fans Can Now Enjoy Butterbeer Ice Cream So Stock Up, Muggles
thread.title_full: ‘Harry Potter’ Fans Can Now Enjoy Butterbeer Ice Cream So Stock Up, Muggles

author: Tim McGovern
title: ‘Harry Potter’ Fans Can Now Enjoy Butterbeer Ice Cream So Stock Up, Muggles
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
As a devout “ Harry Potter ” fan, are you constantly jonesing for some butterbeer, but can’t shell out the galleons and knuts needed to purchase a trip to Universal Studios? 
Then, have no fear (unless you’re surrounded by dementors). Because I have the (completely unrelated to Florean Flortescue’s) ice cream flavor for you! 
Yuengling Ice Cream, from Pennsylvania and not Diagon Alley, is now offering Butterbeer ice cream: Yuengling’s Ice Cream 
So, what’s the overall taste you can expect if you decide to drown your Moaning Myrtle-like sorrows in a tub of Butterbeer ice cream? 
Buttercream and butterscotch flavors, in addition to a butterscotch swirl. Giphy 
President of Yuengling’s Ice Cream, David Yuengling, said in a statement, 
We are always looking for ways to inspire our fans and spark creativity. Whether it’s our flavor names and descriptions or the recipes themselves—we’re in the business of having fun. We hope we made JK Rowling proud with this flavor. Needless to say, the Muggle equivalent of owl-messaging, Twitter , could not contain its glee. Thank you @YuenglingsIC for creating Butterbeer ice cream!!! ❤️❤️ #Potterheads will forever be grateful! I can not wait to try it! 
— Sarah McCandlish (@SarahLiz217) March 21, 2017 For one Twitter user, this is the best thing to ever happen to ice cream. I've never been more excited about ice-cream than I have right now… #HarryPotter #Butterbeer https://t.co/2lI8G8Svep 
— Carina Walsh (@carinageek) March 21, 2017 *Googles “how to tell your employer you’re moving to Pennsylvania because of an ice cream flavor”* Looky what we found in our grocer's freezer! @YuenglingsIC #Butterbeer ice cream. And it's amazing! #HarryPotter #icecream #yum pic.twitter.com/LIWH691mdT 
— Dis Downlow (@disdownlow) March 21, 2017 Honestly, this might be the only good thing to happen in 2017 so far. Wow I always wanted butterbeer when I read HP 2017 really coming around ⚡️ “Dig in to some butterbeer ice cream” https://t.co/sgUSV4paIh 
— Casey Cassinelli (@CaseyCassinelli) March 21, 2017 Lauren Nickols needs to use a Marauder’s Map like right now. CAN SOMEONE GET HER SOME FUCKING FLOO POWDER?! There is butterbeer ice cream available somewhere that I now need to find 
— Lauren Nickols (@LaurenNickols) March 21, 2017 Hermione right here is all of us learning about the magical existence of Butterbeer ice cream. #Butterbeer is going to become an ice cream flavor !? pic.twitter.com/YE56wlJWvx 
— Mayumi M (@mayooms) March 21, 2017 All of our work days got a little bit easier knowing a pint of Butterbeer ice cream might be awaiting us when we got home. Me: "I have to work." @YuenglingsIC : "We make #Butterbeer ice cream now." 
— Joe Wituschek (@heyimjoew) March 21, 2017 
Honestly, I think I can speak for the rest of all Muggles when I say we need a real-life equivalent of Firewhisky… and don’t you dare tell me that’s Fireball.
